title: Embedded Network Engineer NEW!
full_description: Embedded Network Engineer Embedded Network Engineer - Skills Required - Networking, Security, Cloud, C, C++, Embedded Systems, Architecture, Programming, Android, MobileJob Title:Embedded Network EngineerJob Location:Sunnyvale, CASalary:Base + Stock OptionsRequirements:5+ Years ExpIf you are an Embedded Software Engineer with experience, please read on!We are a heavily backed VC funded auto industry startup changing how cars are designed and built to run new applications that are disrupting the market. We are looking for a senior embedded software engineer to join our team, we offer a competitive base salary from 150k - 200k and large stock options.What You Will Be Doing Develop efficient, robust, and secure software for next-generation automotive systems - Architect, design, code, test, review, bring up and document software for complex embedded systems - Work across software stack from driver, HAL, middleware, to API and application developmentWhat You Need for this PositionMore Than 5 Years of experience and knowledge of: C / C+- RTOS / Android / Embedded Linux other embedded OS - Ethernet, TCP/IP, HTTP - Data structure algorithmsWe are looking for engineers very strong in any of the following categories: Strong hands on development coding (Required) - Networking (Required) - Data Management - Embedded OS - Linux Kernel - Security + Firewall + Authorization + Authentication + Intrusion Detection + Proxy ServersNice to Have: Masters Degree / PhD in Computer Science or Embedded Engineering - Understanding MCU, CPU - Python - Cloud - Automotive project developmentWhat's In It for You Competitive Base Salary - Large Stock Options - Medical - Bonus - 401kSo, if you are a Embedded Software Engineer with experience, please apply today!Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.Your Right to Work - In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.*Embedded Network EngineerCA-SunnyvaleAA4-1532529*
